expt_aim: Testing how people rate small differences in sentences
sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
All of the weekends were sunny.
Two of the players were skillful.
He thought the cookie was good.
The student was tired or hungry.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
Some but not all of the weekends were sunny.
Two but not three of the players were skillful.
He thought the cookie was excellent.
The shirts were sometimes but not always striped.
The student was either tired or hungry.
